description.zh-cn: 中国东南沿海重要的中心城市、最早对外开放的四个经济特区之一，亦属计划单列市及副省级城市。
description.en: An important central city on the southeastern coast of China, one of the first four special economic zones to open up, and also a city with separate planning status and a sub-provincial city.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党厦门市委员会书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the Secretary of the CPC Xiamen Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任厦门市人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the Director of the Standing Committee of the Xiamen Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任厦门市人民政府市长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the Mayor of the Xiamen Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国人民政治协商会议厦门市委员会主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the Chairman of the Xiamen Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 明朝将领。
description.en: A general of the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝时期侵扰中国沿海的日本海盗。
description.en: Japanese pirates who raided the coasts of China during the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明末清初军事家，南明政权的将领。
description.en: A military leader at the end of the Ming and the beginning of the Qing dynasties, a general of the Southern Ming regime.

description.zh-cn: 郑成功长子，明郑时期台湾的统治者。
description.en: The eldest son of Koxinga and the ruler of Taiwan during the Kingdom of Tungning.

description.zh-cn: 清朝时期小刀会领袖。
description.en: A leader of the Small Swords Society during the Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝时期小刀会领袖。
description.en: A leader of the Small Swords Society during the Qing Dynasty.

nodes.id: 国民革命军第十九路军

zh-cn: 国民革命军第十九路军

en: People's Revolutionary Government of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国女指挥家。
description.en: A Chinese female conductor.

description.zh-cn: 华侨领袖。
description.en: An overseas Chinese leader.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代妇产科学的奠基人。
description.en: The founder of modern obstetrics and gynecology in China.

description.zh-cn: 程朱理学的集大成者。
description.en: The most influential rationalist Neo-Confucian in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代文学的代表作家。
description.en: A representative writer of modern Chinese literature.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央总书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党厦门市委员会

description.zh-cn: 崔永辉自2021年10月起担任中国共产党厦门市委员会书记。
description.en: Cui Yonghui has served as the Secretary of the CPC Xiamen Municipal Committee since October 2021.

relationships.target: 厦门市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 杨国豪自2022年1月起担任厦门市人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: Yang Guohao has served as the Director of the Standing Committee of the Xiamen Municipal People's Congress since January 2022.

description.zh-cn: 伍斌自2024年9月起担任厦门市人民政府市长。
description.en: Wu Bin has served as the Mayor of the Xiamen Municipal People's Government since September 2024.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议厦门市委员会

description.zh-cn: 张国旺自2025年1月起担任中国人民政治协商会议厦门市委员会主席。
description.en: Zhang Guowang has served as the Chairman of the Xiamen Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference since January 2025.

description.zh-cn: 为防备倭寇，周德兴于1387年在嘉禾屿（今厦门岛）设立中左守御千户所。
description.en: To defend against Wokou pirates, Zhou Dexing established the Zhongzuo Shouyu Qianhusuo on Jiahe Islet (present-day Xiamen Island) in 1387.

description.zh-cn: 中左守御千户所的设立是为了防备倭寇的侵扰。
description.en: The Zhongzuo Shouyu Qianhusuo was established to defend against the raids of the Wokou pirates.

description.zh-cn: 1655年，郑成功将中左守御千户所改名为思明州。
description.en: In 1655, Koxinga renamed the Zhongzuo Shouyu Qianhusuo to Siming Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 1661年，郑成功以思明州为基地，率领部队征服台湾。
description.en: In 1661, Koxinga used Siming Prefecture as a base to lead his troops to conquer Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 1663年，郑经将思明州改制为思明县。
description.en: In 1663, Zheng Jing reorganized Siming Prefecture into Siming County.

description.zh-cn: 1663年，清军攻占厦门岛，思明县随之被废除。
description.en: In 1663, the Qing army captured Xiamen Island, and Siming County was subsequently abolished.

description.zh-cn: 根据1842年的《南京条约》，厦门成为中国最早开放的五个通商口岸之一。
description.en: According to the Treaty of Nanking in 1842, Xiamen became one of the first five treaty ports in China to be opened to foreign trade.

description.zh-cn: 1853年，黄德美与黄威率领小刀会在厦门发动起义。
description.en: In 1853, Huang Demei and Huang Wei led the Small Swords Society in an uprising in Xiamen.

description.zh-cn: 1853年，黄威与黄德美率领小刀会在厦门发动起义。
description.en: In 1853, Huang Wei and Huang Demei led the Small Swords Society in an uprising in Xiamen.

description.zh-cn: 1900年，日本方面制造厦门事件，意图侵占厦门。
description.en: In 1900, Japan orchestrated the Amoy Incident with the intention of occupying Xiamen.

description.zh-cn: 厦门事件最终导致了鼓浪屿公共租界的产生。
description.en: The Amoy Incident ultimately led to the establishment of the Kulangsu International Settlement.

relationships.source: 国民革命军第十九路军

description.zh-cn: 1933年11月，国民革命军第十九路军发动“闽变”。
description.en: In November 1933, the 19th Route Army of the National Revolutionary Army launched the Fujian Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: “闽变”导致了中华共和国的成立。
description.en: The Fujian Rebellion led to the establishment of the People's Revolutionary Government of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1938年5月13日，日军发动厦门战斗并占据厦门全岛。
description.en: On May 13, 1938, the Japanese army launched the Battle of Amoy and occupied the entire island.

description.zh-cn: 1949年10月17日，中国人民解放军发动厦门战役并攻克厦门。
description.en: On October 17, 1949, the People's Liberation Army launched the Battle of Xiamen and captured the city.

description.zh-cn: 厦门战役后，厦门市人民政府于1949年10月21日成立。
description.en: After the Battle of Xiamen, the Xiamen Municipal People's Government was established on October 21, 1949.

description.zh-cn: 厦门爱乐乐团由指挥家郑小瑛于1998年创办。
description.en: The Xiamen Philharmonic Orchestra was founded by conductor Zheng Xiaoying in 1998.

description.zh-cn: 陈嘉庚出生并成长于厦门地区。
description.en: Tan Kah Kee was born and grew up in the Xiamen area.

description.zh-cn: 林巧雅出生并成长于厦门地区。
description.en: Lin Qiaoya was born and grew up in the Xiamen area.

description.zh-cn: 朱熹曾寓居同安（今属厦门市），并于1153年主持扩建同安孔庙。
description.en: Zhu Xi once resided in Tong'an (now part of Xiamen) and presided over the expansion of the Tong'an Confucius Temple in 1153.

description.zh-cn: 鲁迅曾经在厦门地区工作。
description.en: Lu Xun once worked in the Xiamen area.

description.zh-cn: 习近平曾经在厦门地区工作。
description.en: Xi Jinping once worked in the Xiamen area.
